title: Ashley Graham exudes maternity glamour in pink dress as she cradles her bump
text:
She's a style icon who is about to be a first time mother.

And Ashley Graham was the epitome of maternity chic as she flaunted her baby bump on Thursday.

The fashionista, 31, cradled her bump while striking a series of poses for a shoot posted to her Instagram.

Haute mama-to-be! Ashley Graham was the epitome of maternity chic as she flaunted her baby bump on Thursday

Ashley was indeed glowing as she rocked a pink wrap dress with thigh-high slit and strappy black heels.

Slicking her locks up into a messy yet stylish bun, the model exuded radiance with a touch of blush, copper eye shadow, and a touch of lipstick.

She added a hint of dazzle with her large hoop earrings.

In addition to the posed up snap, Ashley sang to herself a positive mantra.

Strike a pose! The stunning star sang out her daily mantras while taking part in the shoot

Hello gorgeous: Graham's radiant complexion was accented with peachy blush and copper eye shadow

'Oh she cute! She's cute! She really, really cute!' she said in an accompanying video.

'Sometimes I like to turn my affirmations into songs,' Ashley explained in the caption.

It won't be long until Ashley will be a new mom.

Feeling herself! 'Oh she cute! She's cute! She really, really cute!' Graham sang to herself

The model and her husband Justin Ervin announced in August they were expecting their first child.

'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life. It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world! Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin ❤️ Life is about to get even better,' she wrote on Instagram.

Accompanying the message was a video unveiling her bump.

'Surprise!' she exclaimed gleefully alongside her husband.
description: The fashionista, 31, cradled her bump while striking a pose on Instagram. Ashley was indeed glowing as she rocked a peachy wrap dress with thigh-high slit and strappy heels.
